description: This Java source file defines a Spring Boot REST controller named HelloController, providing basic endpoints for welcome message, documentation redirect, health check, and application info.

classes.name: HelloController
classes.description: A REST controller providing basic endpoints for welcome message, API documentation redirect, health check, and application information.

methods.name: hello
methods.description: Returns a welcome message when the root URL is accessed.

methods.name: docs
methods.description: Redirects to Swagger UI documentation page.
